name: Bouquet Specials (Pointed Heads) Claro
additionalNotes:
Vitola is called " Bouquet Specials - Pointed Heads"

Frank Correnti Cigars is Canada's only manufacturer of Cuban hand-made cigars and the exclusive importer of Cuban Raw Leaf.
Frank Correnti imports all the finest leaves from Cuba and makes the cigars completely by hand in the old Cuban tradition using Cuban cigar rollers.
http://www.correnticigars.com/index.php
